string.text: Raise Funds to Become an Ecologist
Sakharov wants me to raise 17,000 RU to help the Ecologists if I want to join them.

Ah, well, we don't normally recruit stalkers to become Ecologists. However, we just happen to currently be in a bit of a bind. We are running out of funding for our current research project. We need at least 17,000 RU to keep it going. If you are willing to raise the money for us, you can join our camp.
Wonderful! Excellent! Thank you! Please, make yourself at home here, fellow Ecologist.
%s Tissue Sample for Sakharov
Sakharov needs a tissue sample from a %s.
None
I need to collect tissue samples from a %s. I don't care how you get it, just make sure it's fresh. Get here A.S.A.P. as soon as you recover what I need from the mutant.
Thank you, sir. This will help immensely in my research.
Contain the Zombie Outbreak
A large horde of zombified stalkers has escaped the production complex in Yantar. Help the Ecologists contain the outbreak.

A large mass of zombified stalkers has been sighted emerging from the production complex and they are heading this way. My colleagues have taken up defensive positions outside but they are lightly armed and not very well trained for combat. Please go out and help them contain the outbreak before it spreads!
You have done well. Please accept this as a reward.
Eliminate Yantar Mutant Threat
Professor Sakharov is concerned about the safety of his fellow researchers. Eliminate the mutant threat in Yantar to keep the scientists from being attacked.
Oh yes, good, good! I have a job for you indeed. My researchers have been getting harassed by some of the local wildlife. Would you mind clearing out the area before these rouge mutants hurt someone?
Thank you stalker. Please accept this as payment for your services.
Sakharov Research Documents
Some of Professor Sakharov's research papers were left behind when his scientist fled from a mutant attack. Retrieve the documents and return them to Sakharov.

Ah, yes, I'm glad you asked. One of my researchers just returned from the field. He had to abandon his notes after being attacked by mutants. He is terrified to go back there. I need that research, stalker. Please retrieve it for me, I will gladly compensate you for your trouble.
Thank you stalker! Please, take this as your payment.
